info.name: cake.hr: condensed calendar
info.additionalInfo:
- Tiny calendar row height.
- Zoomed photo popover in calendar.
- System font.

Changelog
2017-01-05 Photo popover trigger restricted to name cell, instead of whole row.
2017-05-12 (Fix - calendar rows are condensed again after cake.hr update)
2017-07-11 Total rewrite after structure changes; only table-related tweaks ported. (Screenshots are now obsolete.)
2017-07-20 Slim team headers with different background; row hover emphasis (just non-demanding text underline)
